en.title: FE Donates RM 20,000 to Persatuan Budi Penyayang Daerah Bentong!
en.content:
FE is proud to donate RM 20,000 (comprising cash and scalar energy products) to Persatuan Budi Penyayang Daerah Bentong. The association was formed in January 2009 to show love, kindness and support to the following groups of people:

- Senior citizens.
- Disabled communities.
- Sick patients who need lifelong medical help.
- Single mothers.

The mock cheque was presented during FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner 11th April 2009 to the Founder of the association Mr Chong Tuck Meng by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and FE Founder Director KS Lee.
